[栏]
Simplified from 欄 ( 闌 → 兰 )

[欄]
Phono-semantic compound ( 形聲 / 形声 , OC *ɡ·raːn ): semantic 木 ( “ wood ” ) + phonetic 闌 ( OC *ɡ·raːn ) .

[楝]
Phono-semantic compound ( 形聲 / 形声 , OC *ɡ·reːns ): semantic 木 ( “ tree ” ) + phonetic 柬 ( OC *kreːnʔ ) .

[棟]
Phono-semantic compound ( 形聲 / 形声 , OC *toːŋs ): semantic 木 ( “ wood ” ) + phonetic 東 ( OC *toːŋ ) .
